solution_line_template: There are {jamie_last_name_length} letters in Jamie’s last name, so Bobbie’s name is {jamie_last_name_length}*{multiplier_for_bobbie} +{letters_added_back_to_bobbie} = <<{jamie_last_name_length}*{multiplier_for_bobbie}+{letters_added_back_to_bobbie}={bobbie_last_name_length}>>{bobbie_last_name_length} letters long.

Samantha’s last name is {samantha_fewer_letters} letters shorter than Bobbie’s, so there are {bobbie_last_name_length} - {samantha_fewer_letters} = <<{bobbie_last_name_length}-{samantha_fewer_letters}={samantha_last_name_length}>>{samantha_last_name_length} letters in Samantha’s last name.
